item.title: LAST CHANCE — Virtual Registration forCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025Closes April 4
item.description: LAST CHANCE — Virtual Registration forCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025Closes April 4blogBy CVE Program|April 1, 2025Registration for virtual attendance toCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025is open through April 4, 2025, on theFIRST conference website. Virtual admission registration is US $100.00. Discounted rates are not offered for this event regardless of membership or speaking status. This is your last chance, soregister today!

item.title: Thank You for Participating in Our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey”
item.description: Thank You for Participating in Our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey”newsApril 8, 2025TheCVE Programsincerely thanks everyone who responded to our “CVE Data Usage and Satisfaction Survey” that opened on March 4, 2025, and closed on April 4, 2025. Your feedback will play a crucial role in enhancing the CVE Program and its service offerings.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 249 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for April 7, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 249 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for April 7, 2025blogBy CVE Program|April 8, 2025

item.title: The Qt Company Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: The Qt Company Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsApril 8, 2025The Qt Companyis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all supported The Qt Company products.

item.title: TP-Link Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: TP-Link Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsApril 8, 2025TP-Link Systems Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for TP-Link issues only. Read the TP-Link news release: “TP-Link Systems Inc. Receives CVE Numbering Authority Designation for Cybersecurity Vulnerability Management.

item.title: Sandisk Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Sandisk Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsApril 8, 2025Sandiskis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Sandisk products listed athttps://shop.sandisk.com/product-portfolioonly.

item.title: Happening This Week:CVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025, April 7–10, 2025
item.description: Happening This Week:CVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025, April 7–10, 2025blogBy CVE Program|April 8, 2025Click here to see the “VulnCon 2025” program agenda for all four days.

item.title: CTOne Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: CTOne Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsApril 15, 2025CTOne Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in cellular (LTE/4G/5G) devices and protocols that are not in another CNA’s scope.

item.title: Jaspersoft Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Jaspersoft Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsApril 15, 2025Jaspersoftis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Jaspersoft products and services only.

item.title: Spotfire Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Spotfire Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsApril 15, 2025Spotfireis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities associated with the Spotfire product only.
